og.title: Agasteer
og.description: The simplest Markdown app with GitHub sync

features.title: Direct GitHub Sync
features.description: Save directly to your GitHub repository without intermediate servers. Your data stays under your control.

features.title: Zero Conflicts
features.description: Always pulls on startup. GitHub is the single source of truth. Safe sync from multiple devices.

features.title: Vim Mode
features.description: hjkl key navigation for fast editing on PC. Perfect for Vim users.

features.title: Rule Line Mode
features.description: Display notebook-like ruled lines. Hand-written note feel for better focus.

features.title: Japanese Themes
features.description: Unique themes for Japanese users including retro RPG-style blue windows.

features.title: PWA Support
features.description: No installation needed, start instantly in browser. Works offline too.
